citations.narrative:
The facility has two aardvarks. The aardvarks were moved to the inside holding of a new primary enclosure. The
aardvarks were able to open the single door, which had a levered handle, on May 2, 2024 when they jumped up on the
door. The aardvarks escaped the enclosure. The licensee stated that one aardvarks was found within the perimeter fence
and the other dug under the perimeter fence and escaped the facility. Per the licensee the aardvark that escaped the
facility was recaptured on May 7, 2024 .
Failure to construct and maintain facilities in good repair can lead to escape, injury or death of an animal.
The facility must be constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the animals involved. The indoor
and outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals
from injury and to contain the animals.
To be corrected from this day forward, August 30, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
